title: Multi-AI Code Engine - World's First 3-AI Coding System
preview: Telegram bot combines Gemini 3 + Kimi 2.5 + Claude 4.5. Import n8n workflow → Get ZIP files better than Cursor.
full: Complete n8n workflow JSON + optimized prompts for world's first multi-AI coding system: 1) Telegram Trigger (text/files), 2) Intent recognition AI Agent, 3) User project storage (Google Drive by user_id), 4) Gemini 3 Logic Planner (debug/planning), 5) Kimi 2.5 Code Generator (creative implementation), 6) Claude Sonnet 4.5 Final Polish (lint/format/validate), 7) Summary generator, 8) ZIP archive creation, 9) Telegram ZIP delivery with changelog. Pay-per-use APIs only ($0.03/request). No file limits, fully editable, beats Cursor Pro. Includes exact setup video script, API key configs, test cases. First 1000 sales @ $12.

title: Viral VEO3 Shorts Machine: Auto-Generate & Publish YouTube AI Videos Daily
preview: Complete n8n workflow that auto-generates viral YouTube Shorts with VEO3 AI video + GPT content creation.
full: Production-ready n8n automation that creates and publishes daily viral-style YouTube Shorts completely hands-free. Features: 1) Daily scheduled GPT-powered viral idea generation (web dev/AI/cybersecurity niches), 2) Structured VEO3 prompt engineering for cinematic 9:16 before/after transformation videos, 3) VEO3 API integration for automatic video rendering, 4) Google Sheets tracking (idea, caption, prompt details, status, YouTube URL), 5) Direct YouTube Shorts upload with optimized titles/captions/hashtags, 6) Full error handling and retry logic, 7) Production-ready workflow with detailed setup instructions. Perfect for creators scaling consistent short-form content. Download the complete n8n workflow JSON and import directly into your n8n instance.

title: Discord MT5 Trading Bot: Execute Forex Trades via Chat
preview: AI-powered Discord bot that executes MT5 forex trades from simple chat commands like 'buy EU market 2% sl 50'.
full: Production-ready n8n workflow transforms Discord into your live trading terminal. Features: 1) GPT-4o-mini AI classifies 6 command types instantly, 2) Regex + AI fallback parses flexible syntax (EU=EURUSD, GU=GBPUSD), 3) Market/limit orders routed to your MT5 broker via local webhooks, 4) Signal management (view/clear pending trades), 5) Real-time Discord feedback with confirmations/errors, 6) Risk management with % position sizing + SL/TP automation, 7) Mobile-ready - trade from Discord phone app, 8) Full error handling. Works with any MT5 broker account. Includes complete workflow JSON + setup guide. Perfect for hands-free forex execution.

title: Automate Blog Content Creation with GPT-4, Perplexity & WordPress
preview: Download a complete n8n workflow to automate blog content creation using GPT-4, Perplexity, and WordPress.
full: Complex multi-step n8n automation that fully automates blog content creation and publishing. This workflow orchestrates GPT-4 for content generation, Perplexity for research and fact-checking, and WordPress for automated publishing. It integrates with Notion for content planning, Lmchatopenai for AI processing, and Slack for real-time notifications and workflow monitoring. Built using 17 nodes and connected to 9 different services, this production-ready automation handles data processing, content structuring, and publishing with minimal human input. Download the complete n8n workflow JSON and import it directly into your n8n instance.

title: Build an Automated API Monitoring Script
preview: Create a script that monitors API uptime, logs errors, and sends alerts when issues are detected.
full: Write a production-ready Node.js script that monitors a REST API endpoint every 5 minutes. The script should log response time, status codes, and failures to a local JSON file. If the API fails more than 3 times consecutively, send an email alert using Nodemailer. Use clean async/await patterns, environment variables for configuration, and include detailed comments explaining each major step. Add graceful shutdown handling and comprehensive error logging.

title: Create a REST API with Express and MongoDB
preview: Build a complete RESTful API with authentication, CRUD operations, and MongoDB integration.
full: Create a production-ready Express.js REST API with the following features: 1) User authentication using JWT tokens, 2) CRUD endpoints for a 'products' resource with validation, 3) MongoDB integration using Mongoose with proper schema design, 4) Middleware for error handling and request logging, 5) Rate limiting to prevent abuse, 6) API documentation using Swagger/OpenAPI, 7) Environment-based configuration, 8) Comprehensive error responses with proper HTTP status codes. Include folder structure recommendations and security best practices.

title: Python Web Scraper with Error Handling
preview: Build a robust web scraper that handles pagination, retries, and exports data to CSV.
full: Write a Python web scraper using BeautifulSoup and Requests that: 1) Scrapes product data (title, price, rating, URL) from an e-commerce site, 2) Handles pagination automatically, 3) Implements exponential backoff retry logic for failed requests, 4) Respects robots.txt and includes user-agent rotation, 5) Saves data to CSV with proper encoding, 6) Logs progress and errors to a file, 7) Uses command-line arguments for URL and output file. Include detailed comments and exception handling for network errors, missing elements, and rate limiting.

title: Stripe Payment Integration Guide
preview: Complete implementation of Stripe payment processing with webhooks and subscription handling.
full: Create a comprehensive Stripe integration that includes: 1) One-time payment processing with card tokenization, 2) Subscription creation and management with multiple tiers, 3) Webhook handling for payment success/failure events, 4) Customer portal integration for self-service subscription management, 5) Invoice generation and email notifications, 6) Proper error handling and refund processing, 7) Security best practices including signature verification for webhooks. Provide both frontend (React/vanilla JS) and backend (Node.js) code examples with environment configuration.

title: React Component Library Setup
preview: Set up a reusable React component library with TypeScript, Storybook, and npm publishing.
full: Guide me through creating a professional React component library that includes: 1) Project setup with TypeScript, Rollup, and proper package.json configuration, 2) Component development with props validation and TypeScript interfaces, 3) Storybook integration for component documentation and testing, 4) CSS-in-JS styling solution (styled-components or Emotion), 5) Unit testing with Jest and React Testing Library, 6) Automated versioning and changelog generation, 7) npm publishing workflow with GitHub Actions, 8) README with usage examples and contribution guidelines. Include folder structure and best practices for maintainability.

title: Dockerize a Full-Stack Application
preview: Create Docker configuration for a complete application with database, backend, and frontend.
full: Write a complete Docker setup for a full-stack application that includes: 1) Dockerfile for Node.js backend with multi-stage builds, 2) Dockerfile for React frontend with nginx serving, 3) docker-compose.yml orchestrating backend, frontend, PostgreSQL, and Redis, 4) Environment variable management across services, 5) Volume configuration for data persistence, 6) Health checks and restart policies, 7) Development vs production configurations, 8) .dockerignore file optimization. Include commands for building, running, and debugging the containerized application.

title: Build a Real-Time WebSocket Chat Application
preview: Create a production-ready real-time chat application using Socket.io with rooms, authentication, and message persistence.
full: Develop a complete real-time chat system with the following features: 1) WebSocket server using Socket.io with connection pooling and reconnection logic, 2) JWT-based authentication for socket connections with token refresh, 3) Private messaging and public chat rooms with join/leave events, 4) Typing indicators and user presence tracking (online/offline/away), 5) Message persistence using MongoDB with pagination and message history retrieval, 6) File sharing support for images and documents with size validation, 7) Message editing, deletion, and read receipts, 8) Rate limiting to prevent spam and abuse, 9) Admin controls for user management and moderation. Include both backend Socket.io server code and React frontend components with complete error handling and reconnection strategies.

title: Implement OAuth2 Social Login System
preview: Build a complete OAuth2 authentication system supporting Google, GitHub, and Facebook login with account linking.
full: Create a comprehensive OAuth2 authentication system that includes: 1) OAuth2 flow implementation for Google, GitHub, and Facebook using Passport.js strategies, 2) Account linking for users with multiple OAuth providers, 3) JWT token generation with access and refresh token rotation, 4) Email/password fallback authentication with bcrypt password hashing, 5) Email verification workflow with secure token generation, 6) Password reset functionality with time-limited tokens, 7) User profile merging when linking accounts, 8) Session management with Redis for scalability, 9) CSRF protection and secure cookie handling, 10) Rate limiting on authentication endpoints. Include complete Express.js backend with React frontend login forms, proper error handling, and security best practices following OWASP guidelines.

title: Build a GraphQL API with Subscriptions and DataLoader
preview: Create a production-ready GraphQL API with queries, mutations, real-time subscriptions, and optimized data fetching.
full: Develop a complete GraphQL API using Apollo Server that includes: 1) Schema design with proper type definitions, interfaces, and unions, 2) Query resolvers with pagination using cursor-based approach, 3) Mutation resolvers with input validation using Yup or Joi, 4) Real-time subscriptions using PubSub for live data updates, 5) DataLoader implementation to prevent N+1 query problems and batch database requests, 6) Authentication and authorization middleware with context-based user verification, 7) Custom directives for field-level permissions (@auth, @hasRole), 8) Error handling with custom error classes and error codes, 9) File upload handling for single and multiple files, 10) Rate limiting and query complexity analysis to prevent abuse, 11) PostgreSQL integration using Prisma or TypeORM with connection pooling, 12) GraphQL Playground configuration for development and testing. Include complete schema definition, resolver implementations, and subscription setup with Redis for production scalability.

title: Create a Microservices Architecture with Node.js
preview: Design and implement a production-ready microservices system with service discovery, API gateway, and inter-service communication.
full: Build a complete microservices architecture that includes: 1) Multiple independent services (User Service, Product Service, Order Service, Notification Service) with clear domain boundaries, 2) API Gateway using Kong or Express Gateway for request routing, authentication, and rate limiting, 3) Service discovery using Consul or Kubernetes DNS for dynamic service registration, 4) Inter-service communication via REST APIs and message queues (RabbitMQ or Kafka), 5) Event-driven architecture with domain events for loose coupling, 6) Centralized logging with ELK stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana) for log aggregation, 7) Distributed tracing using Jaeger or Zipkin for request flow visualization, 8) Circuit breaker pattern using Hystrix or resilience4j for fault tolerance, 9) Database per service pattern with PostgreSQL and MongoDB, 10) Configuration management with environment-based configs and secret management, 11) Health checks and monitoring endpoints for each service, 12) Docker Compose setup for local development with hot-reload. Include complete folder structure, service templates, communication patterns, and deployment strategies for cloud environments.

title: Build an Advanced Caching Strategy with Redis
preview: Implement a production-grade caching system using Redis with cache invalidation, warming, and distributed locking.
full: Create a comprehensive caching solution that includes: 1) Redis connection setup with connection pooling and cluster support, 2) Multi-layer caching strategy (in-memory cache + Redis) with automatic fallback, 3) Cache-aside pattern implementation with lazy loading, 4) Write-through and write-behind caching patterns for different use cases, 5) Smart cache invalidation strategies (TTL, LRU, manual invalidation), 6) Cache warming on application startup for frequently accessed data, 7) Distributed locking using Redis for preventing cache stampede, 8) Cache key design patterns and namespace organization, 9) JSON serialization/deserialization with compression for large objects, 10) Pub/Sub pattern for cache synchronization across multiple instances, 11) Cache hit/miss ratio monitoring and analytics, 12) Cache versioning strategy for schema changes. Include middleware for Express.js, caching decorators for TypeScript, error handling for Redis connection failures, and performance benchmarking code. Add Redis configuration for production with persistence options (RDB/AOF).

title: Implement Advanced Git Workflows and CI/CD Pipeline
preview: Set up a complete CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions, automated testing, code quality checks, and multi-environment deployment.
full: Create a production-ready CI/CD pipeline that includes: 1) Git branching strategy (GitFlow or trunk-based) with protected branches and PR requirements, 2) GitHub Actions workflows for automated testing on every push and PR, 3) Linting and code formatting checks using ESLint, Prettier, and commitlint, 4) Unit testing with Jest and integration testing with Supertest, 5) Code coverage reporting with Codecov integration and minimum coverage thresholds, 6) Security vulnerability scanning using npm audit and Snyk, 7) Docker image building with multi-stage builds and layer caching, 8) Automated versioning using semantic-release based on conventional commits, 9) Deployment to multiple environments (dev, staging, production) with environment-specific configurations, 10) Automated rollback on deployment failures with health check validation, 11) Slack/Discord notifications for build status and deployment updates, 12) Database migration execution during deployment with rollback support, 13) Secrets management using GitHub Secrets and environment variables, 14) Performance testing integration with Lighthouse CI for frontend apps. Include complete .github/workflows YAML files, pre-commit hooks configuration, and deployment scripts for AWS, Vercel, or DigitalOcean.

title: Build a Serverless REST API with AWS Lambda and DynamoDB
preview: Create a production-ready serverless API using AWS Lambda, API Gateway, and DynamoDB with proper IAM policies and monitoring.
full: Develop a complete serverless application on AWS that includes: 1) Lambda functions written in Node.js with proper async/await error handling, 2) API Gateway configuration with RESTful endpoints, request validation, and CORS setup, 3) DynamoDB table design with primary keys, secondary indexes (GSI/LSI), and query optimization, 4) IAM roles and policies following least-privilege principle for Lambda execution, 5) Environment variable management and secrets using AWS Systems Manager Parameter Store or Secrets Manager, 6) CloudWatch logging with structured logs and custom metrics for monitoring, 7) Lambda layers for shared code and dependencies to reduce deployment size, 8) API Gateway Lambda authorizer for JWT token validation, 9) Request throttling and rate limiting at API Gateway level, 10) DynamoDB auto-scaling configuration for production workloads, 11) VPC configuration if accessing private resources, 12) Local development environment using SAM CLI or Serverless Framework, 13) Infrastructure as Code using CloudFormation or Terraform, 14) Cost optimization strategies (memory tuning, cold start reduction). Include complete handler functions, DynamoDB query patterns, deployment scripts, and monitoring dashboards setup.

title: Create an Advanced Search System with Elasticsearch
preview: Implement a production-grade full-text search engine with Elasticsearch, including faceted search, autocomplete, and relevance tuning.
full: Build a comprehensive search solution that includes: 1) Elasticsearch cluster setup with proper node roles (master, data, ingest), 2) Index design with custom analyzers, tokenizers, and filters for different languages, 3) Mapping configuration with proper field types, multi-fields, and nested objects, 4) Full-text search with fuzzy matching, phrase matching, and proximity queries, 5) Faceted search with aggregations for filtering by categories, price ranges, and tags, 6) Autocomplete and search-as-you-type functionality using edge n-grams, 7) Relevance tuning with custom scoring, boosting fields, and function score queries, 8) Synonym handling and stemming for better search recall, 9) Bulk indexing with batching and error handling, 10) Real-time index updates with refresh intervals optimization, 11) Search result highlighting for matched terms, 12) Pagination with scroll API for large result sets, 13) Query optimization and performance monitoring with slow log analysis, 14) Integration with Node.js using official Elasticsearch client. Include index templates, search query builders, aggregation examples, and performance benchmarking scripts.

full: Develop a complete video streaming backend that includes: 1) Video upload and processing pipeline using FFmpeg for transcoding, 2) Adaptive bitrate streaming (HLS/DASH) with multiple quality levels, 3) Video chunking and segmentation for optimal streaming performance, 4) CDN integration (CloudFront or Cloudflare) for global content delivery, 5) Signed URLs and token-based authentication for secure video access, 6) User progress tracking with resume playback functionality, 7) Real-time viewer analytics and watch time metrics, 8) Thumbnail generation at multiple timestamps, 9) Subtitle/caption support with WebVTT format, 10) DRM integration for premium content protection, 11) Concurrent stream limiting per user account, 12) Video metadata management (title, description, tags, categories), 13) Search functionality with Elasticsearch for video discovery, 14) Recommendation system based on watch history and user preferences, 15) S3/Cloud Storage integration for video file storage with lifecycle policies. Include complete upload handler, transcoding queue system using Bull or AWS MediaConvert, streaming endpoint configuration, and player integration examples for web and mobile.

title: Implement Advanced Rate Limiting and API Throttling
preview: Build a production-grade rate limiting system with Redis, supporting multiple algorithms and distributed environments.
full: Create a comprehensive rate limiting solution that includes: 1) Multiple rate limiting algorithms (Token Bucket, Leaky Bucket, Fixed Window, Sliding Window), 2) Redis-based distributed rate limiting for multi-instance deployments, 3) Per-user, per-IP, and per-endpoint rate limit configurations, 4) Tiered rate limits based on user subscription level (free/premium/enterprise), 5) Custom rate limit headers (X-RateLimit-Limit, X-RateLimit-Remaining, X-RateLimit-Reset), 6) Graceful degradation when Redis is unavailable with in-memory fallback, 7) Rate limit bypass for whitelisted IPs and API keys, 8) Dynamic rate limit adjustment based on system load, 9) Rate limit analytics and monitoring dashboard, 10) Custom error responses with retry-after information, 11) Integration with Express.js middleware and Fastify decorators, 12) GraphQL query complexity-based rate limiting, 13) WebSocket connection rate limiting, 14) Automated testing for rate limit scenarios. Include complete middleware implementation, Redis Lua scripts for atomic operations, configuration examples, and load testing scripts to validate rate limiting under high traffic.

full: Develop a complete multi-tenant SaaS platform that includes: 1) Tenant isolation strategies (database per tenant vs shared database with row-level security), 2) Dynamic tenant routing based on subdomain or custom domain, 3) Tenant provisioning and onboarding workflow with automated setup, 4) Role-based access control (RBAC) within each tenant organization, 5) Usage tracking and quota management per tenant (API calls, storage, users), 6) Subscription and billing integration with Stripe for tiered pricing plans, 7) Tenant-specific customization (branding, custom fields, feature flags), 8) Data export functionality for tenant data portability, 9) Cross-tenant analytics and reporting for platform administrators, 10) Automatic tenant suspension on payment failure with grace period, 11) Database migration system that handles schema changes across all tenants, 12) Background job processing with tenant context propagation, 13) Monitoring and alerting per tenant with resource usage dashboards, 14) Compliance features (GDPR data deletion, audit logging, data encryption). Include complete middleware for tenant resolution, database connection pooling strategies, subscription lifecycle management, and deployment guide for scaling to thousands of tenants.

title: Build a Restaurant Management System
preview: Create a POS system with menu management, orders, and inventory tracking.
full: Restaurant system with: digital menu with categories, order taking (dine-in/takeaway/delivery), kitchen display system, table management, bill splitting, payment integration, inventory tracking, supplier management, employee shifts, sales reports, and customer loyalty program. Include receipt printing, real-time order updates, and offline mode.

title: Create a Gym Management Software
preview: Build a fitness center management platform with memberships and class scheduling.
full: Gym software with: member registration and profiles, membership plans with billing, class scheduling and booking, check-in system with QR codes, trainer assignment, workout logging, attendance tracking, payment collection, freeze/cancel memberships, email notifications, and progress reports. Use PostgreSQL, Stripe for payments, and QR code generation.

title: Build a Stock Trading Simulator
preview: Create a paper trading platform with real-time stock data and portfolio management.
full: Trading simulator with: real-time stock prices via Alpha Vantage API, virtual portfolio with buy/sell orders, watchlists, market orders and limit orders, portfolio performance tracking, charts with technical indicators, news integration, leaderboards, trading competitions, and educational resources. Use React for charts (Recharts/TradingView), Node.js backend, and MongoDB.

title: Create a Telemedicine Platform
preview: Build a telehealth app with video consultations and appointment booking.
full: Telemedicine platform with: patient registration, doctor profiles and availability, appointment booking, video consultation using WebRTC, prescription management, medical records storage, payment integration, calendar sync, SMS/email reminders, chat messaging, file sharing (lab results), and HIPAA compliance features. Use Twilio for video, PostgreSQL for data, and encryption for sensitive info.

title: Build a News Aggregator Platform
preview: Create a news reader with RSS feeds, personalization, and saved articles.
full: News aggregator with: RSS feed parsing, content categorization, personalized feed based on interests, saved/bookmarked articles, search functionality, trending topics, source management, offline reading, dark mode, reading progress sync, sharing to social media, and newsletter digest. Use Node.js for feed parsing, MongoDB for storage, and machine learning for recommendations.

title: Create a Document Collaboration Platform
preview: Build a Google Docs alternative with real-time editing and version control.
full: Document platform with: real-time collaborative editing using OT or CRDT, rich text formatting, comments and suggestions, version history, document sharing with permissions, templates, export to PDF/Word, offline editing, mobile apps, folder organization, and search. Use Quill.js or ProseMirror for editor, WebSocket for sync, and MongoDB for storage.

title: Build a Parking Spot Finder App
preview: Create a parking availability app with reservations and navigation.
full: Parking app with: map view of available spots, real-time availability updates, spot reservation and booking, navigation to parking location, pricing and payment integration, parking history, favorites, reviews and ratings, parking reminders, and multi-city support. Use Google Maps API, React Native, Node.js backend, and PostgreSQL with PostGIS.

title: Create a Language Learning Platform
preview: Build a Duolingo-style app with lessons, exercises, and progress tracking.
full: Language learning platform with: structured lessons and courses, interactive exercises (fill-in-blank, matching, speaking), spaced repetition system, streak tracking, achievements and gamification, pronunciation practice, progress dashboard, vocabulary builder, daily goals, and leaderboards. Use React, Node.js, speech recognition API, and MongoDB.

title: Build a Freelancer Marketplace
preview: Create a platform connecting freelancers with clients for project work.
full: Freelancer marketplace with: freelancer profiles with portfolios, job posting by clients, proposal system, milestone-based payments with escrow, time tracking, messaging system, contract management, dispute resolution, review and rating system, and project collaboration tools. Use Stripe Connect for payments, Next.js frontend, and PostgreSQL database.

title: Create a Music Production Collaboration Platform
preview: Build a platform for musicians to collaborate on tracks remotely.
full: Music collaboration platform with: project workspaces, audio file upload and versioning, commenting on specific timestamps, real-time collaboration, DAW integration, stem sharing, mixing and mastering tools, project sharing, credit management, and licensing. Use Web Audio API, S3 for audio storage, WebSocket for real-time features, and MongoDB.

title: Build a Virtual Event Platform
preview: Create an online conference platform with live streaming and networking.
full: Virtual event platform with: live streaming using WebRTC or third-party service, multiple concurrent sessions, chat and Q&A, networking lounges with video chat, virtual expo booths, attendee directory, calendar with session scheduling, on-demand replay, polls and surveys, and analytics dashboard. Use Next.js, Socket.io, and integration with Zoom/Twitch for streaming.

title: Create a Subscription Box Service Platform
preview: Build a subscription e-commerce platform with recurring billing.
full: Subscription platform with: product catalog for subscription boxes, customization options, subscription management (pause, cancel, skip), recurring billing with Stripe, shipping integrations, referral program, gift subscriptions, preference surveys, unboxing experience portal, and customer feedback. Use Next.js, PostgreSQL, and Stripe Subscriptions API.

title: Build a Legal Document Generator
preview: Create a platform for generating legal documents with templates and customization.
full: Legal document platform with: template library (contracts, agreements, NDAs), dynamic form builder, conditional logic, e-signature integration, document preview and editing, version control, team collaboration, document storage, audit trail, and export to PDF. Use React for form builder, Node.js backend, and DocuSign API for signatures.

title: Create a Smart Home Dashboard
preview: Build a home automation control panel with device integration.
full: Smart home dashboard with: device discovery and pairing, real-time status monitoring, automation rules and scenes, scheduling, energy usage tracking, multi-room control, voice command integration, mobile app, notifications and alerts, and third-party integrations (Philips Hue, Nest, Alexa). Use MQTT for device communication, React for UI, and Node.js backend.

title: Build a Car Rental Platform
preview: Create a vehicle rental marketplace with booking and fleet management.
full: Car rental platform with: vehicle listings with specs and photos, availability calendar, booking system with insurance options, pricing calculator, payment integration, driver verification, rental agreements, GPS tracking, damage reporting, customer reviews, and fleet management dashboard for owners. Use Next.js, PostgreSQL, Stripe, and Google Maps API.

title: Create a Grocery Delivery App
preview: Build a grocery ordering platform with delivery scheduling and inventory sync.
full: Grocery delivery app with: product catalog with categories, shopping cart with saved lists, delivery time slot selection, real-time order tracking, substitute item preferences, recurring orders, digital receipts, loyalty points, coupon system, inventory management, and driver assignment. Use React Native, Node.js, Socket.io for tracking, and PostgreSQL.

title: Build a Pet Adoption Platform
preview: Create an animal shelter platform with pet listings and adoption applications.
full: Pet adoption platform with: pet profiles with photos and descriptions, search filters (species, age, size), adoption application forms, approval workflow, favorites list, success stories, donation system, foster program management, event calendar, and volunteer coordination. Include PostgreSQL, image uploads, email notifications, and admin panel.

title: Create a Tutoring Marketplace Platform
preview: Build a platform connecting students with tutors for online and in-person lessons.
full: Tutoring marketplace with: tutor profiles with qualifications and ratings, subject and level filtering, session booking with calendar integration, video call integration for online tutoring, payment processing with Stripe Connect, homework help requests, progress tracking, session notes, review system, and messaging. Use Next.js, PostgreSQL, WebRTC for video, and calendar sync.
